item.title: About
item.description: Script Terror is a blog about web software development by Norman Steger. Norman is a Software Engineer with a preference for JavaScript and TypeScript based technology stacks located in Regensburg, Germany. While also not shy of working on webservices in the backend, he is most enthusiastic about: user experience agile methodology test driven development behavior driven development Currently he works as a consultant at Comsysto Reply GmbH, where he helps customers in industries like automotive, telecommunications, insurance, transportation or finance to build digital experiences for tomorrow.

item.title: Why Testing in React is superior to Angular
item.description: Or: Why I hate unit testing in Angular Every good article needs to start with a click-baity title that polarizes the masses. And thus I can already feel an army of enfuriated Angular developers breathing down my neck as I write these lines. Since you naturally practice TDD, bcause you’re a responsible professional (even though you probably don’t), you will know that testing logic Angular down to the method can be a pain in the ass.
